bio: Raven Rock's eerie landscapes witnessed the transformation of Nether Valley, a Vampire Bat mage conjurer, harboring ambitions to master the arcane. A practitioner of conjuration and restoration magic, her journey unfolded in the shadowy corners of the catacombs. Confronting her fear of the sun, she trained with a master vampire, emerging as a conjurer unafraid of the daylight's piercing gaze.
name: Nether Valley
